Author: mdakin
Content:
Once a problem is characterized the solution often follows naturally.

Luckily there are no physical laws that prevent reasonable solutions to business/social problems of this sort.

Author: nickb
Content:
Who re-implemented rsync? Who re-implemented finger? What about talk?

When you start looking, you'll realize that blogger, mozy, twitter, GTalk etc. etc. are nothing more than versions of UNIX command line programs :)

They say that a successful startup will implement and modernize one of the UNIX command line programs. I couldn't agree more.

Author: deramisan
Content: Be sure to check out the Romlet on the sidebar of the site that is linked to - though that's just one version (the other can be seen in preview format on Romlet.com)

Author: mattculbreth
Content: Heresy!  I loved PowerBuilder and I won't have some dude saying it's dead, even if I haven't seen it in 8+ years.

Author: mikesabat
Content:
I just wrote a comment on my site. I think that someone needs to spread the word about the product - more than just emails. The list focuses on development and cooperation, but there needs to be passion and a voice - a right brain. Thanks for the post.

Here are some thoughts. mikesabat.wordpress.com
